statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + x - 3 , -16 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x - 18 , -10 \, x^{3} + 9 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x - 9 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
